text: Nicinga ukuba ukubonelela abahambi abangcwele ngamanzi okusela nokugcina iMasjid eNgcwele (eMakkah) kuyafana na ngexabiso nabo bakholwa kuAll창h nakwiMini yokuGqibela, bezabalaza ngamandla besilwa eNdleleni ka-All창h? Abafani phambi koAll창h. Kananjalo uAll창h Akabakhokeli abantu abangabagabadeli
